name: @basisbeeld/json-utils
description: JSON utilities to process changes and paths in json objects
author: Incubator

scripts.dev: yarn run build:commonjs --watch & yarn run build:esm --watch && kill $!
scripts.build:esm: rm -rf esm && NODE_ENV='production' BUILD_ESM='true' yarn run babel -f ./babel.config.js src --source-maps --out-dir esm
scripts.build:commonjs: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV='production' yarn run babel -f ./babel.config.js src --source-maps --out-dir dist
scripts.build:bundle: rm -rf build && NODE_ENV='production' yarn run babel -f ./babel.config.js src --source-maps --out-file build/index.js
scripts.build:release: yarn run lint && yarn run test:coverage && yarn run build:commonjs && yarn run build:esm && yarn run build:bundle
